camera_and_perspective.view_angle: High-angle drone shot, Aerial bird's eye view, Wide urban context
camera_and_perspective.lens_attributes: Wide-angle lens (approx 24mm), Rectilinear correction, Slight atmospheric compression in background
camera_and_perspective.depth_of_field: Deep focus, Infinite depth of field, Sharp edge-to-edge clarity

lighting_and_atmosphere.light_quality: Directional but soft sunlight (approx 45 degree elevation), Bright ambient sky fill, Low contrast shadows
lighting_and_atmosphere.weather_conditions: Clear sky with faint horizon haze, Atmospheric perspective, Blue sky gradient
lighting_and_atmosphere.shadow_style: Soft definition cast shadows, Natural daylight occlusion, Medium length shadows indicating morning sun

architectural_lighting.interior_illumination: Daylight reflection on glass, Dark recessed window cavities, Non-illuminated interiors (Daytime state)
architectural_lighting.exterior_facade_effects: Natural sunlight highlighting geometric forms, Warm white diffuse reflection, Shadow play on curved volumes, No artificial exterior lighting visible

landscape_lighting.hardscape_illumination: Natural daylight exposure on geometric paving patterns, High albedo surface reflection
landscape_lighting.vegetation_highlighting: Natural sunlight on tree canopies, Soft shadow casting on lawns
landscape_lighting.water_feature_effects: Daylight mirror reflection, Still water surface

color_and_grading.palette_theme: High-key, Clean white and cool greys, Desaturated urban tones, Natural greens
color_and_grading.temperature: Cool/Neutral daylight balanced, Slight blue tint in shadows
color_and_grading.post_processing: Low contrast curve, Exposure compensation +1.0 (Bright), Realistic color grading, Clean sharp finish, Minimal vignette

rendering_tech_specs.engine_style: Lumion style aerial, V-Ray photorealism, Architectural visualization standard
rendering_tech_specs.artistic_medium: Photorealistic aerial photography, Digital architectural rendering
rendering_tech_specs.detail_level: 8k resolution, Hyper-realistic, Crisp textures, High fidelity urban context

environment_textures.ground_surface: Geometric paved plaza, Manicured lawn stripes, Asphalt city roads, Tiled pedestrian walkways
environment_textures.foliage_style: Young urban street trees, Organized grid planting, Manicured public park vegetation
